use: To treat adult patients with basal cell carcinoma, the most common type of skin cancer.

name: Inlyta
use: To treat patients with advanced kidney cancer (renal cell carcinoma) who have not responded to another drug for this type of cancer.

name: Picato
use: For the topical treatment of actinic keratosis.

name: Voraxaze
use: To treat patients with toxic levels of methotrexate in their blood due to kidney failure.
